languages.text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text:
Когда персонаж должен упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, этого не происходит, а стазис-поле немедленно восстанавливает ему <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. На 1 раунд персонаж теряет все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

traits.locale_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} würde, stellt ein Stasisfeld sofort <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her. Der Träger verliert alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, aber erhält 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang +30 % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.
Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden!
languages.original_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} werden würde, stellt ein Stasisfeld stattdessen sofort <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her. Der Träger verliert alle {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, aber erhält +30 % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}.
Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden!

languages.text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur est censé {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdre connaissance{/g}, un champ de stase lui permet de récupérer immédiatement <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}END{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Il perd tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, mais bénéficie de +30 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} pendant 1 round.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque l'utilisateur est censé {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perdre connaissance{/g}, un champ de stase lui permet de récupérer immédiatement <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Il perd tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, mais bénéficie de +30 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text:
当装备者即将陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，会立刻恢复部分{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。装备者会失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高30%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
！此效果每场战斗只能使用一次。
languages.original_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者即将陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态时，会立刻恢复部分{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。装备者会失去所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，但{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高30%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
！此效果每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text:
Si el portador quedaría {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, un campo de estasis regenera inmediatamente <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. El portador pierde todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, pero obtiene +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} durante 1 asalto.
! Solo puede usarse una vez por combate.
languages.original_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador queda {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, un campo de estasis regenera inmediatamente una <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales. El portador pierde todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, pero obtiene +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}.
! Solo funciona una vez por combate.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、ステイシスフィールドは直ちに<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}の負傷{/g}から回復する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを失うが、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を30％獲得する。
！1回の戦闘で1回のみ使用可能。
languages.original_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、ステイシスフィールドは直ちに<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}の負傷{/g}から回復する。使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}すべてを失うが、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を30％獲得する。
！1回の戦闘で1回のみ使用可能。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж должен упасть {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, этого не происходит, а стазис-поле немедленно восстанавливает ему <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. На 1 раунд персонаж теряет все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
languages.original_text:
When the wielder must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wielder loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, yet gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж должен {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}упасть без сознания{/g}, этого не происходит, а стазис-поле немедленно восстанавливает ему <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} персонаж теряет все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Когда персонаж должен {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}упасть без сознания{/g}, этого не происходит, а стазис-поле немедленно восстанавливает ему <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ВЫН{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} персонаж теряет все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и получает +30% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

languages.text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Takan kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygın{/g} düşeceği durumlarda bir staz alanı, anında {unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} sağlık puanı tazeler. Kişi tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP'sini{/g} kaybeder ancak 1 turluğuna +%30 {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} kazanır.
! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
When the wearer must fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a stasis field immediately recovers <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} instead. The wearer loses all {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but gains +30% to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} for 1 round.
! Can only be used once per combat.
